folder_setup.title: Step 1: Create your grAIde workspace folder
folder_setup.intro: grAIde needs a Google Drive folder to store your data spreadsheet and test photos. This will be your grAIde workspace.

instructions.title: Here's how to create it:
instructions.step1: Open Google Drive on your computer
instructions.step3: Right-click the folder → Share → Copy link

folder_setup.input_label: Google Drive workspace folder share link

validation.invalid: This doesn't look like a valid Google Drive folder link

confirmation.title: All set!
confirmation.message: grAIde will automatically create a "graide-data" spreadsheet in this folder. You can now:

features.upload: Upload test photos to this folder from your phone
features.organize: Sort them in the Photo Inbox
features.review: Review and edit everything in the spreadsheet

status.creating_spreadsheet: Creating graide-data spreadsheet in your folder...

workspace_setup.title: Set Up Your Workspace
workspace_setup.description: To get started, grAIde needs access to a Google Drive folder where it will store your data.
workspace_setup.spreadsheet_desc: Database for classes, students, tests, and grades
workspace_setup.folder_url_help: Create a folder in Google Drive, click Share, and paste the link here
workspace_setup.error_no_url: Please enter a Google Drive folder URL
workspace_setup.error_invalid_url: Invalid Google Drive folder URL. Please check and try again.
workspace_setup.error: Failed to create workspace. Please try again.
